website_summaries.verdict: Smaller than the average bath mat, so it's easy to move around.
pros: Uses suction cups over the bottom surface of the bath mat to make sure it remains in place
Mat can be run through a washing machine to keep it clean and remove any mold or mildew
Weighs just 1 lb., so you can move it anywhere

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I originally only gave this 3 stars, but I'm updating my review to give five stars, and if I could give 10 stars for customer service, I would. I had an issue and was contacted by the company making and selling these, and they insisted on sending me a free one to replace the one that had torn. I'm not used to such amazing customer service, and they really are dedicated to making a great product that will last. As someone who has to have secure footing in the bath, I appreciate them very, very much, and it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: WMF

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: See my photos. This bath mat DOES build up mold. I bought mine 5 months ago after reading all the reviews. Everyone seemed to agree that mold or mildew doesn't build up. It does. Many of the reviewers are reviewing the product right when they get it, which almost defeats the purpose of understanding the true quality of the product. Overall the mat "works" and prevents me from slipping in the tub, but having to clean this nasty mold off is not appealing. I recommend shopping around more before buying this mat. Don't just purchase it because it's the #1 best selling bath mat on Amazon. The reviews are meaningless.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to overflow a walk-in shower with this mat
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work well as a shower mat. In the product description it says it can be used as a shower mat. However, when using in the shower it does not allow the water to drain through the mat and down the shower drain. It is very easy to overflow a walk-in shower with this mat. For me, this product does not work as described and is, therefore, useless and a waist of $$$$$..
customer_reviews.author: Skip in Texas

customer_reviews.title: I think this was not new. I found mold ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this was not new. I found mold in the back of the mat. Wish I could send a picture.
customer_reviews.author: omafour

customer_reviews.title: Safest mat EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first bathmat I bought 2 yrs ago.It is so-o-o-o safe for my husband who is a frequent faller. His shower chair stays exactly grounded on this mat, and the mat stay exactly grounded to the shower floor. I purchased another brand for the RV shower, and it slid on second use. Luckily, I was the one standing on it when that happened. I immediately returned to get another one of these. There is nothing safer out there at any price than this mat. By the way...our shower floor surface is not smooth, and still this mat holds. I am slowly ordering 4 more to keep in reserve.
customer_reviews.author: Jean5099

customer_reviews.title: Anti-bacterial treated
customer_reviews.text: After I received it, I noticed it said “anti-bacterial treated.” The whole reason I wanted a natural rubber bath mat was to avoid toxins, and whatever chemical they used to treat it can’t possibly be good for my baby to put her bare bottom on during a bath. I wish it had been more clear that it was treated with an anti-bacterial chemical in the item description.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Use on flat surface only.
customer_reviews.text: When looking for a tub mat was reading descriptions looking for a mat that would work on textured bottom of tub. This one said it would work. That is why I ordered it. When it arrived a paper wound around the mat said it would work only on a untextured surface. So description was incorrect and mat was of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Namebrand replacment
customer_reviews.text: Needing to replace previous mat, decided to try this verse the cost of replacing previous name brand. Do not know why prices went up so much. This is all but identical except says Epica instead of other brand. Same size, same 'feel', same pattern of textured surface. Noted no overpowering oder so didn't need airing out which was nice. I did cut out center for better drainage . We always hang after use but we will see long term if any difference in mold resistance which we've never had issue with. Other than that half price for what appears same mat...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a very pretty bathmat, but I ordered it because we had problems with previous mats mildewing. This one wasn't supposed to, and is machine washable. However, when it arrived the instructions said to remove it from the tub to air dry after every use. Honestly, that's never going to happen. Too much trouble. The mat does not have holes and is opaque, so I can't see if it's mildewing underneath. I will have to check periodically. I am glad I can machine wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Epica bath mat. The first one worked pretty well but only lasted 10 months. Holes developed around the suction cups and soon there were several suction cups about ready to come off. I thought I'd try another since it was fairly inexpensive. This one looks a bit stronger and like it might not be subject to the same kind of deterioration. However, since it shipped all rolled up, I'm still waiting for the extreme curl on the one end to straighten out. That said, I like the natural rubber build but I guess time will tell if this one lasts any longer than the first.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walthers

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was possible from the heat from the sun but it continues to leave the plastic like residue even in cooler temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mat for almost 2 years and it held up so-so. It started to leave residue on the side of the tub about 5 months in. I thought it was possible from the heat from the sun but it continues to leave the plastic like residue even in cooler temperatures. It's newrmly impossible to get off. I didn't have the mildew and mild problem others had but it definitely is didcolored.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A RECENT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Since I have had this mat in use only a couple of weeks, I can't testify to its durability or anything about cleaning it. However, at the moment I am happy with it. The mat is thicker than the one I had used previously and more comfortable to stand on. My shower is in the bathtub, so I could use a longer mat than this one, but that is not a particularly important issue. This mat stays put, so no slipping. With white on white, it is an unobtrusive item. My major concern is mold which has been an issue with previous mats. If it can be kept clean and fresh, I will be well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: 4Graces

customer_reviews.title: Three years and still 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have waited three years to write this review because I wanted to see if this bath mat really is meeting my needs. The answer is a resounding YES. Not one single complaint. Easy to clean was plain from day one but, regarding suction and mold, anti-bacterial, well that comes over time with daily use .I'm satisfied on all counts. It has never slipped. I have never put mine in a washing machine, just the usual cleaning and rinse after use and give it a good shake then hang it over the shower rod. It looks as good after three years as it did when I pulled it out of the package. Easy to give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the heavy rubber type bath mat. I am so pleased. I have not been able to find these in local stores. This is the exact type the hotels have. It actually suctions to the tub without coming up in places. It’s the perfect size for the tub. I love it and highly recommended this Mat.
customer_reviews.author: Dalevic

customer_reviews.title: Great bath mat!
customer_reviews.text: I find it strange that I'm going to leave a review for a bath mat, but I have to because I searched for so long for a good bath mat and went through so many before buying this one. It doesn't move around at all and I love how easy I can wash it in the washer. It's also long enough to cover a good chunk of the tub bottom and doesn't become slippery when soap or shampoo gets on the surface. It's definitely worth the purchase and I'm happy with ours.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a quality bath mat to use in my tub for standing on that would not slip when stepping in and out of the tub and this deliverd. Epica is great bath mat that is easy to clean, comfortable to stand on and stays secure to my tub. All that for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This mat only covers maybe half of the length of my tub, which is not ideal for small children who are constantly moving around. My child has already slipped twice in the last couple days. Also, the mat has a terrible odor and needed to be aired out for several days. As a note, the suction cups are very rigid, unlike my previous mat, so if you wait too long to remove it from the tub. It will rip.
customer_reviews.author: Grazy

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellant product for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new shower mat because our old one was sliding around the shower stall and very well worn out!!! It was very risky using our old shower mat, in a way, it was like super slippery when you were just tring to take a shower. So we decided it was well past the time to replace the old mat with this new mat, and WOW, what a difference in Quality! Thanks to Epica and Amazon, I think we found the best shower mat out there for our use and need's, BIG THANKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David P. Mogel

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this bath mat as it is used for my 1 year old... This mat does not stick to the tub floor... It collects water underneath and builds up a mildew smell... If you plan on using this, prepare to have the ends flip up and have to take it out and clean it after every use...
customer_reviews.author: Autumn & Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat for a tub that had been fitted with a liner. The liner was incredibly slippery even though it had a built-in texture. Knowing this mat (as many others we had tried) might not work, we had to try. It worked beautifully! It felt slightly squishy, but never moved. When I removed it for cleaning the suction was obvious as it sounded like bubble wrap popping. Every suction cup had held. Because I was fully prepared to be disappointed, the effectiveness of this mat came as a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Informed Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Got moldy on top after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it 11 months, and over the last 3 months a black mold stain has been spreading on the top. Nothing gets rid of it, it seems to be inside the mat. Apart from that, it's a good mat, sticks and stays non-slip. But we bought it because it claimed it wouldn't go moldy.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Those we love are now SAFE in the bathtub!
customer_reviews.text: When our long-time vet closed recently, we had to figure out a way that our groomer could still bathe our two Basset Hounds every couple of weeks. She was open to do house calls, (with plenty of masks, gloves, and a good sense of 'soclal distancing,') so has been bathing them in one of our spare bathrooms with a full tub. To keep them from slipping and hurting themselves, we bought this tub mat, and it does its job. The pups are safe and our groomer can do her job. ALL GOOD!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Ellen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: This bath mat is perfect! It is comfortable to stand on
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat is perfect! It is comfortable to stand on, easy to pull up and rinse off after my shower and I hang it dry in between uses. I also followed the instructions and upon receiving it, washed it in a cold water cycle and then hung it dry and there was no residual odor from packaging and it being made of rubber. I highly recommend this bath mat for anyone and everyone. It would be nice to have underneath you in a bath too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great non slip, but dirty fast
customer_reviews.text: Great for non slip but gets dirty fast (not sure if that's mold or rust from hard water collecting on it, but it was there within a week). Also, it's hard to clean around the suction cups if you want a fast clean instead of sticking it in the washer (which I have yet to try). It's too heavy to dry by sticking on the wall, so you have to hang it over your bathtub or something to dry. But, yeah, the non slip is pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: SMSS

customer_reviews.title: Great Anti-Slip Mat for Tub
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I haven't used my new one yet, but I have another one just like it, and maybe from the same company, I don't know. I am waiting to open it. It arrived on time and in excellent condition. It is also as was advertised. We love our other one. This will be used as a spare or for vacations. I will buy again if and when needed. Thank you for the great product! It is Anti-Slip, and sticks to the tub. Just make sure you push down on the suction things on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Masson

customer_reviews.title: Sorry David this one missed the mark
customer_reviews.text: I received this bath mat in good time. It was good looking and did not smell of rubber. I do have a big problem with the mat having a permanent on one of the corners. I tried to heat it with a hair dryer. this worked a little but when it cooled the curl came right back. I am sorry but this mat is not safe to use. If the manufacturer reads this review and makes the right decision on how to make this right, I can always amend this review. Thank you Grove S. Millsap
customer_reviews.author: stew millsap

customer_reviews.title: This one is a winner!!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the thousands of reviews for a bathmat. Who would go to all that trouble unless it was really special? So I ordered it as it sounded just like what I was looking for. It came and I was very pleased immediately with the quality. The suction cups, and I've never seen so many on a bathmat before, were easy to stick. It feels wonderful to stand on and also to sit on in the bath. Very comfortable! Very safe, too. No odor. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed....I place in dry tub before shower, turn on shower and water underneath raises mat so that when I step in, the mat slips a few inches, making it unsafe to use...I have tried stepping on mat to make it adhere before I start water and it still slips...I had bought a mat a few years earlier from Amazon and when I clicked "buy again" I got a different brand...the last place you want to be slipping is in the shower
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great bathmat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. The first one was at least 10 years old before it started to show mold, stains etc. If this one lasts that long, I will be a happy camper. Great suction, very secure but easy to take up. I just hang it over my handicapped bath rail and hose it down with the shower head and leave to dry. Wash once a month in the washing machine and we are all set to go again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gibeau

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESN’T STINK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bathmat. I’ve tried various mats & have always been disappointed because they are cheaply made & they all smell like a skunk, even after I’ve tried cleaning them with various products, including bleach, and even tried hanging out in the sunshine. Even tried Old Father Time. This mat costs more - and is worth every penny! It is the highest quality. Even the color blends in nicely with my tub. I highly recommend this non-slip bathmat.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Footing and Lots of Suction Cups
customer_reviews.text: With many little suction ups on bottom, the bath mat really holds and gives a firm, stable footing. I like the smooth top; it's a much better feel than mats with holes. Be sure mat doesn't cover drain! Didn't notice any uncomfortable smells when mat arrived. Took a few days to smooth out curl at end of mat but no problem. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Rubbermaid
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Epica Anti Slip bath mat we've purchased. The first last one years and 8 months. Way more than the typical Rubbermaid products but not what we had expected. If the mat would have lasted longer I would have happily given it five stars. We do pull the mat from the tub after each use, which may contribute to its shorten life span, but by pulling it up to dry prevents any mildew/mold problems.
customer_reviews.author: Glassblower

customer_reviews.title: This product should not be advertised as a safety product ...
customer_reviews.text: This product should not be advertised as a safety product at all. The auction cups do not stick to the tub and top is extremely slippery once water touches the surface. In fact, I believe this would cause a fall rather than help prevent one!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kerns

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.text: This is not made from natural rubber! It is made from some toxic materials. After opening the packaging my eyes, nose, and throat immediately started burning. The smell was a strong chemical odor and washing it with water seemed to make it worse. I had to immediately take it out of my house because I felt like my throat was swelling. So scary! And I normally do not have allergies, etc. I have never experienced anything like it. I think it's a crime to sell something so disgusting and potentially extremely harmful DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hullinger

customer_reviews.title: It keeps a tight grip on the tub floor.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing worse than a slippery tub floor during a shower, and a shower mat that slides around. This mat has great suction, no sliding around, and it dries pretty quickly after use. I hang it over the side of the tub, suction side up, and let it air dry. Haven't seen any mold, but it does require a bit of cleaning every month. I have soft water and it does leave a film on stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, on-time delivery. loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I often use almond oil during the shower and my bathtub become quite slippery. I used to buy other bath mat in the local stores and it seemed still slippery and doesn't stick to the tub easily. This is a perfect medium size for my tub, sticks well, and very firm and not slippery at all. I probably need more weeks to check the status but so far so good. I liked it so much that I have ordered 3 more in case this product become unavailable from Amazon (sometimes it does). :) because it is so hard to find something like this.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Best mat I've used
customer_reviews.text: Our tub gets very slick when we're showering, so something to make it non-slippery is necessary. We don't want stickers, so we've tried several different kinds of mats, including Rubbermaid, my previous favorite. This mat is a perfect size - not too big, not too small, - is much more comfortable to stand on, doesn't smell bad, and picks up mold less than any of the others. I strongly recommend this shower mat, and plan to buy this brand again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Linny86

customer_reviews.title: Loved 1st one - order another for guest bath
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bath mat! We hang it over tub after each shower (as recommended). Stays put and is a great size. We only bought one for our new home. When our grandbabies spent the night realized we didn't have a bath mat in guest bath! We borrowed the one from our bath (been using about 4 mos) and because we dry it upside down every time, it looked clean and not grungy. Went to order another one and was thrilled at the price reduction. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CLFMLF

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat but doesnt work with texture tub
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bath mat because i found my 1 year old standing in the tub and slipping. My tub has some antislip texturing built into it. After reviewing several different mats, what stood out to me about this mat was that it was washable, anti,bacterial, and that it worked with antislip tubs (most important in my case). Unfortunately to my dismay, the suction cups would not stick to my textured tub at all. I was able to return the item to amazon without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Bath Mat
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for the first time today, at the start, I wasn't sure about it slipping, but, my mind was soon put at ease, it clung to the tub nicely. I would have liked it a little longer, it's shorter than the mat I had been using, but, it's fine. The material seems decent, don't know about the durability or cleaning, that will come later. So far, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This the second shower mat I have purchased for another location from this manufacture. The suction is excellent and the top surface feels very safe. One of the users is handicapped and feels very secure using it. The length of the mat is generous as well. I feel the quality and pricing is very fair and I believe the product is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: From Arizona Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Showering on a secure bath mat
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to clean. The little suction cups adhere to tub securely once pressed onto damp tub. The top of the mat is non skid for your feet while showering. And removing from the tub after the shower is easy. Pulling gently so as to not to pull up any of the suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and feels good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. Had a mat a long time ago that got ugly looking and had to be thrown out. Getting older and worried about slipping in the tub, so ordered this one. Something about it feels more "solid" than the other. I guess because it's rubber. No problem putting it in and taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Peters

customer_reviews.title: So cushiony on my feet!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy one of these years ago?! I am so glad I purchased this bathtub mat. It has great suction and stays secure. It's small enough to fit two thirds of my tub and keeps me from slipping when I am showering or shaving my legs. I spray it off and put it over an inside towel bar to dry. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Deedee56

customer_reviews.title: Stays put and doesn't hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is VERY easy to clean and stays where you put it. I purchased this particular mat because it had MANY SMALL suction cups. The two previous mats I had had large suction cups that didn't always stick. While standing on it you could feel the large cups through the mat and they hurt my feet. This one is very comfortable and there's no slippage. Very glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Harber-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mat as my toddler was slipping in our tub (shocking, I know). Our tub has raised circles that I assume is supposed to help with grip but in reality does nothing. I was worried that the bath mat wouldn't stick properly on it, but it does. It has many small suction cups on the back of it, which allow it to stick to my tub. My son hasn't slipped once since we got this mat. I've stood on it in the shower and like the cushion, plus I definitely feel more sturdy. I do pull it up when we're done, as when it's left down there is water underneath it that won't dry.
customer_reviews.author: bak1120

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell and residue
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars bc they smell strongly (still, even after being open for a month plus and one use) and seemed to leave a residue of some sort. I bought 4 to line my shower basin for when I wash the dog to protect my shower from his nails. I cut a hole in one to allow for easy draining. They did the job perfectly, but still off gasing in my closet a month plus later. Maybe it's bc I used then only 1x so far. Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Our bathtub is a little too smooth with no embedded safety strips, and as an old codger I am less sure-footed than I once was. This mat is perfect to enable me to move and turn comfortably and to stay on one foot without risking slipping. Inexpensive safety option.
customer_reviews.author: Cheong Yei

customer_reviews.title: nice bath mat
customer_reviews.text: This bathmat is a little smaller than I expected (even though it clearly states the dimensions). It doesn't cover the entire bottom of my oversized tub. But- it covers for the most part, which is really all I need. Been using it for just over a week. I follow the directions & hang it to dry after every use. Hoping to not grow mold. If/when it does- I'll come back and update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Texan in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Very strong anti-slip grip!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great bath mat! It definitely lived up to the "anti-slip" name. It has very strong suction and is very comfortable. It is not mildew resistant, but I don't think any bath mat really is. Just hang it over the side of the tub after every use or wash the underneath once a week when you clean your tub. I think it is worth the little extra money to have a no slip mat that really works! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: patsfan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a typical suction anti-slip mat that works as advertised. It is flexible, easy to clean and stays put where you place it. The surface is functional and comfortable. Out of the box it had a pretty strong plastic-y odor, but a couple of days of leaving it out eliminated that problem. Now it has no odor whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever did for me!
customer_reviews.text: Great bath mat! As a senior citizen who is unsteady on my feet and has great difficulty standing or turning I am no longer afraid of slipping or falling in the shower, It is soft, easy to use, grips well and is easy to remove and clean, Can't begin to recommend this product to anyone who is concerned about safety issues in the shower,
customer_reviews.author: Dari

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The rough surface of our bath tub has worn down over the years of use. I didn't feel as secure on it when showering. This bathmat is exactly what I wanted and needed. I feel very confident that I won't slip in the tub. I have another bathtub in my house and didn't realize I had puchased the very same mat for it. I made a good decision twice!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! It is comfy & cushiony to sit on. It sticks to the tub and does not move or float to the top like the lightweight ones being sold in recent years. I had one like this a long time ago but forgot to hang to dry & left home for a couple of weeks and it developed mold so I had to dispose of it. With proper care these mats literally last forever. Great for preventing falls and injuries for little kids, elderly, everyone, because not slippery, cushioned, & remains firmly in place. I am so happy to get one of these again!
customer_reviews.author: CStat

customer_reviews.title: Epica Bath Mat
customer_reviews.text: My last bath mat was starting to fray around the edges. The Epica was the right size and the surface of the mat was relatively smooth so that mold would not accumulate. I have been using the mat for almost a week and I believe it was the right selection. I rinse it on both sides after a shower and hang it over a clothes rack to dry. I use liquid soap to clean the mat every week. I definitely recommend the Epica bath mat.
customer_reviews.author: basketeer1

customer_reviews.title: I think this is my third purchase and I will continue to buy this very sturdy bath mat again and again
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this particular bath mat for quite a long time. I think this is my third purchase and I will continue to buy this very sturdy bath mat again and again. Thanks to a company that cares about the quality of their product and still maintains a low price for this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Herb

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought when visiting my sister because she doesn't have any. Always great to visit her, but it used to be a dance with death in the bathtub... This is the right size, sticks to the tub, etc. I hadn't expected it to be so easy on the feet, though. It's slightly padded, which is kind of nice.
customer_reviews.author: BobInBrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Tub Mat
customer_reviews.text: After using the rubber mat in the shower, it stayed where it was put, it was secure, and didn't move. The suction was great and you feel safe because the mat stayed in place. It has not been cleaned yet, but being able to put it in the washer is good. Also, the 'antibacterial' factor is appreciated. I would order one again when it's time. The price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Slater

customer_reviews.title: Reading some of the reviews before of those that were not pleased. I took a hit from them
customer_reviews.text: I'm very please with my bath mat. Reading some of the reviews before of those that were not pleased. I took a hit from them. I washed my mat before using it. I make sure it has a chance to air dry after every use. I don't leave the mat to dry in the tub. I've had know problems. Thank you because I've had a problem finding a mat for the type of tub I have.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn D. Battle

customer_reviews.title: Holding up so far
customer_reviews.text: There is 4 of us in the house and 2 are children under 5. We take lots of baths and showers so this is constantly in use and being tested. We have tried so many of these and they all fall apart and get gross pretty quickly. We have had this mat for nearly 6 months and it is holding up by far the best of any we have had in the past. product_meta.title: Epica Anti-Slip Machine Washable Anti-Bacterial Bath Mat 16" x 28" Natural Rubber
product_meta.description: Make every bath or shower you take safer and more sanitary. The Epica bath mat helps minimize the risk of slips and falls while preventing the growth of bacteria and build-up of soap residues. Heavy duty, latex free rubber .Exceptionally resistant to wear and tear, the Epica bath mat is ideal for heavy use situations such as hospitals, assisted living facilities, gyms and hotels, as well as homes with small children, seniors or anyone who requires the highest standards of safety and quality. It's made of sturdy, injection molded rubber which contains no latex, so it's safe for people with a latex allergy. Excellent grip top and bottom . The underside of the mat is covered with suction cups that, once pressed into place, adhere firmly to the floor of a tub or shower stall and will not shift or slide when you step on or off. These suction cups will work whether or not the floor has a nonslip surface. The upper side of the mat is textured, giving your feet extra traction power Inhibits bacteria and soap deposits . Another advantage of the textured surface is that repels slippery soap residues which could cause your feet to slide out from under you. The entire mat is treated with an anti-bacterial agent to keep disease-causing microbes out of your bath. Generous 16" x 28" size . Don't be cheated by smaller sized mats. One reason the Epica works so well is its large size which provides optimum coverage of the tub or shower floor. Wherever you step, your footing will be safe and secure.
feature_bullets: HUNDREDS OF HIGH-STRENGTH SUCTION CUPS FOR ULTIMATE SAFETY: You can be secure knowing that when you put this bath mat in your bathtub or shower, it isn’t going anywhere. The number and generous size of suction cups provides more power than average non-slip bath mats.

ANTI-SLIP RUBBER BATH MAT REPELS SLIPPERY SOAP: No matter how many bubbles you throw at it, the Epica Non Slip Bath Mat isn’t going to let you fall victim to one of the leading causes of serious home injuries.

EASY CLEANING ANTI-BACTERIAL BATHROOM ACCESSORIES: Mold, mildew and bacteria love to hide on the bath mat in your shower or tub. With the Epica Bath Mat, you never have to worry about that. Simply toss the mat into the washing machine now and then and mold stays away.

STYLISH NEUTRAL COLOR LOOKS GREAT IN EVERY SHOWER: You want your bath mat to complement your style, not clash with it. No matter your style, this gorgeous, large 16” x 28” bathtub mat will cover your shower elegantly.
